name: Village Vanquish
description:
STORY:

Revenge clouds the dark, moonless sky as a mad man goes about finishing his ultimate creation. Having been outcast from his hometown, the resident wizard wishes for the destruction of his people. But in the midst of his final incantations, his forest hideout is discovered! With no time left, he improvises the last of his spell and his monster is born! But, it isn’t the monster he was expecting…

Revenge might not be as easy as expected...Good luck!

CONTROLS:

Use The Mouse To Play

Q | W | E = Wizard's Spells

SPELLS:

[ Q ] Rolling Stones - Spawn a Boulder to Crush Enemies and grab the Giant Teddy's Attention.

[ W ] Chain Lightning - Zap foes with the position of your Magical Radar (Cursor) and stun foes in place to keep the Bear Safe.

[ E ] Plague of Fire - Rain down Tears of Fire to Roast Enemies into Edible Meat for your Dim-Witted Companion.

Thanks For Playing This Test LUDUM DARE 46 DEMO!
